TASK: Format text as bold/italic
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open LibreOffice Writer application
   REASONING: Need to launch a word processing application to work with text formatting
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow the system to display the Start menu before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type application name to search
   REASONING: Quickly locate LibreOffice Writer through the search functionality
   ACTION: TYPE("libreoffice writer")

4. Wait for search results
   REASONING: Allow time for the search to populate results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on LibreOffice Writer in search results
   REASONING: Launch the application from the search results
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.25)

6. Wait for application to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the application window and document are ready for interaction
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Type sample text to format
   REASONING: Create content that will be formatted with bold and italic styles
   ACTION: TYPE("This text will be formatted as bold and italic.")

8. Select all the typed text
   REASONING: Need to select the text before applying formatting styles
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

9. Wait briefly for selection to register
   REASONING: Ensure the selection is properly highlighted before formatting
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

10. Apply bold formatting
    REASONING: Make the selected text bold using the standard keyboard shortcut
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "b")

11. Wait for bold formatting to apply
    REASONING: Allow the application to process the formatting change
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

12. Apply italic formatting to the same text
    REASONING: Add italic styling to the already bold text to achieve bold-italic combination
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "i")

13. Click elsewhere in the document to deselect
    REASONING: Deselect the text to clearly see the final bold and italic formatting applied
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.6)

14. Task completion
    REASONING: Text has been successfully formatted with both bold and italic styles
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The text "This text will be formatted as bold and italic." should appear in LibreOffice Writer with both bold and italic formatting applied, making it appear thicker and slanted.
